The `processedHiCdata` package contains example data sets for use with Hi-C
analysis packages. The initial version of this package is intended for 
the sparseHiC package.

Initial samples include the HiC data from mouse and human stem cells
previously described.$^1$


$^1$ Dixon JR, Selvaraj S, Yue F, Kim A et al. Topological domains in
mammalian genomes identified by analysis of chromatin interactions.
Nature 2012 Apr 11;485(7398):376-80. PMID: 22495300
